nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Ahhh. There you are, {name}. Come closer. Let’s see what you brought me… not gifts—results.

choices.label: Show Loki what I did in Hel’s hall.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Three marks. Three little decisions… and each one tells me what you really are.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Now—did you prove you can be wicked… or did you disappoint me with virtue?

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: If you earned *two or more* green checks, you’re worth sharpening. If you earned *three red checks*… I will not pretend you’re anything but a problem.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Perfect. Three green checks. Not a flicker of softness. That’s the kind of evil Dreadheim remembers—quiet, clean, and smiling while it happens.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Two green checks. Hm. Not terrible… but not devotion either. You hesitated somewhere. You flinched. Don’t do that again.

nodes.speaker: Loki
nodes.text: Three red checks?! You walked into my world and chose goodness like a lost child choosing a warm blanket. I don’t reward that. I correct it.
